title: Gui Demo
notes: You can change the path of config.json in the first argument
--clipboard in the first argument take json from clipboard instead of file path config.json, also put the result in clipboard
--input in the first argument take json from standard input stream with method ReadToEnd(), DONT FORGET to close standar input to avoid pogram blocks forever
CANCELED word in result means user cancel action (close window)
When the multiCommand is used in thye result is added a 'commandValue' property to get the selected command
